items.sentence: I can\'t tell you how dangerous that might be.
I can\'t tell you how much I learned from Tom.
All he wanted was time to finish his painting.
All the women thought Tom was really handsome.
All three of my daughters are already married.
We\'re supposed to meet Tom in thirty minutes.
We\'ve been meaning to talk to you about that.
We\'ve been working hard to make some changes.
I thought Tom would bring us something to eat.
I thought Tom would take Mary to the aquarium.
I thought Tom would take a walk before dinner.
Tom certainly didn\'t seem to be expecting us.
Make sure you don\'t do anything to upset Tom.
Mary and I\'ve been going out for three years.
Few people live to more than ninety years old.
Have you been listening to what Tom is saying?
Tom told me that he\'s never coming back here.
Tom seems a lot happier since he got divorced.
Tom should be able to do that if you help him.
Tom should never have been allowed to do that.
